Label.en: It was built between 1162 and 1260, and has been continually modified over the centuries

Label.en: Right up until... you guessed it... the French Revolution of the 1790s!
Label.fr: Right up until... you guessed it... the French Revolution of the 1790s!
Label.es: Right up until... you guessed it... the French Revolution of the 1790s!
Label.zh: Right up until... you guessed it... the French Revolution of the 1790s!

Label.en: Oh yes... they of course trashed the Cathedral...
Label.fr: Oh yes... they of course trashed the Cathedral...
Label.es: Oh yes... they of course trashed the Cathedral...
Label.zh: Oh yes... they of course trashed the Cathedral...

Label.en: And even hacked the heads off statues of biblical figures, thinking them to be Kings of France!
Label.fr: And even hacked the heads off statues of biblical figures, thinking them to be Kings of France!
Label.es: And even hacked the heads off statues of biblical figures, thinking them to be Kings of France!
Label.zh: And even hacked the heads off statues of biblical figures, thinking them to be Kings of France!

Label.en: For a while, it was in danger of being totally destroyed... such was the antipathy towards Catholicism and gothic architecture
